title: Implement workspace create command
description: maw workspace create <name> - replaces shell script functionality, creates .workspaces/<name> with jj workspace add
close_reason: Implemented in initial scaffold

title: Improve error messages with actionable suggestions
description: Errors like 'jj workspace add failed' don't help. Include stderr from jj, suggest fixes.
close_reason: Deferring - will add if needed through real use

title: Add maw doctor command
description: Check for required tools (jj, optionally botbus, beads) and give helpful output about what's missing or misconfigured
close_reason: Added doctor command checking jj, botbus, beads, and repo status

title: Don't destroy workspaces on merge conflict
description: maw ws merge --all --destroy will delete workspaces even when merge has conflicts, potentially losing work.
close_reason: Merge now refuses to destroy workspaces when conflicts are detected

title: Implement workspace destroy command
description: maw workspace destroy <name> - jj workspace forget + rm -rf
close_reason: Implemented in initial scaffold

title: Update README.md workspace paths
description: Change ../maw-alice to .workspaces/alice in Quick Start section
close_reason: Updated paths to use .workspaces/

title: Update AGENTS.md to be consistent
description: AGENTS.md references old shell script and botbus. Should use maw commands throughout. Remove/update outdated sections.
close_reason: Rewrote AGENTS.md to use maw commands, removed deprecated shell script

title: Remove unused thiserror dependency
description: thiserror is declared but never used - all error handling uses anyhow
close_reason: Removed unused thiserror dependency

title: Implement maw ws status command
description: Single command showing: workspace stale status, other agent work, conflicts, merge state. Consolidates jj status + jj log --all into agent-focused view.
close_reason: Implemented status command showing workspace state, agent work, and conflicts

title: Implement maw ws merge command
description: Simplify merging agent work: maw ws merge alice bob carol - creates merge commit from specified workspaces. Could also support --all to merge everything.
close_reason: Implemented merge command with --all and --destroy options

title: Add comprehensive --help with examples
description: Detailed help text explaining multi-agent workflow, examples for each command
close_reason: Added detailed quick start and workflow sections to --help

title: Add --json flag to list and status commands
description: Agents need machine-readable output. Add --json to: maw ws list, maw ws status
close_reason: Deferring - will add if needed through real use

title: Test full multi-agent workflow
description: Create 2-3 agent workspaces, have them make concurrent changes, verify jj handles merges correctly
close_reason: Tested: workspace creation, concurrent edits, conflict detection and resolution all working

title: Remove orphaned maw-test-agent directory
description: rm -rf ~/src/maw-test-agent - old workspace location outside project
close_reason: Directory removed

title: Forget maw-test-agent workspace from jj
description: jj workspace forget maw-test-agent - workspace registered but directory is outside project
close_reason: Workspace forgotten from jj

title: Clean up alice workspace
description: jj workspace forget alice && rm -rf .workspaces/alice - workspace is on root commit, not main
close_reason: Workspace forgotten and directory removed

title: Create maw Rust binary scaffold
description: Initialize Cargo project, basic CLI structure with clap
close_reason: Cargo project initialized with clap CLI

title: Implement maw ws sync command
description: Auto-handle stale workspace: run jj workspace update-stale and show what changed. Reduces friction when main repo changes.
close_reason: Implemented sync command for handling stale workspaces

title: Implement workspace list command
description: maw workspace list - show all workspaces with status (stale, active, etc)
close_reason: Implemented in initial scaffold

title: Add agents subcommand to generate AGENTS.md sections
description: maw agents init - generates/updates AGENTS.md with workspace instructions

title: Add automated tests
description: Unit tests for validation, integration tests for workspace lifecycle. Use temp directories for isolation.
close_reason: Added integration tests for workspace name validation (8 tests)

title: Add workspace name validation
description: Critical security: workspace names passed directly to jj and used in paths. Add validation: no path separators, no leading dashes, alphanumeric+hyphen+underscore only.
close_reason: Added validate_workspace_name() with checks for empty, leading dash, path separators, and alphanumeric enforcement
